topics.body: I know I'm lambasting the kantai anime but I do actually hope that the show is successful cause it's something while it's storyline so far is generic it's something different and it would be kind of cool to see something different get popular.  You don't see a lot of moe gijinka or mecha musume stuff in mainstream anime.  The anime may not exactly give me hope but if it gets popular then maybe other companies will realize that there's a market for this sort of thing?
